Class ValueChangedEvent

java.lang.Object
  |

        |
        +--be.ac.kuleuven.cs.ips2.project2002.logicCircuits.ValueChangedEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ValueChangedEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

Instances of this type carry information about a change in the boolean value of a LogicCircuit (see LogicCircuit.getValue()).

Version:
